name: Subject 113
description:
You are one of the few survivors of the apocalypse. And now is the time for you to be awakened again after 150 years of sleeping in a cryogenic facility.

Just click OK if there's an error prompt, it's the cursor locked issue.

Use WASD key for movement, and mouse to rotate the camera.

Press ESC to open the objective menu

Credits for the music

Scott Buckley
https://soundcloud.com/scottbuckley
free-stock-music.com/scott-buckley-solace.html

Keys of Moon
https://soundcloud.com/keysofmoon
https://www.free-stock-music.com/keys-of-moon-infinitely.html

Note: the windows version is a little bit buggy on the door animations.
